example.code:
PS C:\>New-IAMUser -UserName Bob
Arn : arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/Bob CreateDate : 4/22/2015 12:02:11 PM PasswordLastUsed : 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM Path : / UserId : AIDAJWGEFDMEMEXAMPLE1 UserName : Bob
example.description: This example renames the IAM user named Bob to Robert. If Bob needs to sign in to the AWS console, then you must separately run the command New-IAMLoginProfile to create a sign-in profile with a password. If Bob needs to run AWS PowerShell or cross-platform CLI commands or make AWS API calls, then you must separately run the New-IAMAccessKey command to create access keys.
